publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1743.1 Rhona Brankin: Withdrawal of Modern Apprenticeship Funding—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1743) in the name of Robert Brown, insert at end "condemns the Scottish Government’s failure to invest in Modern Apprenticeships for 16 to 18-year-olds, and calls on the Scottish Government to give 16 to 18-year-olds the right to Modern Apprenticeship places."
S3M-1743.1 Withdrawal of Modern Apprenticeship Funding (lodged on 23 April 2008) Trish Godman*

S3M-1743.1 Rhona Brankin: Withdrawal of Modern Apprenticeship Funding—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1743) in the name of Robert Brown, insert at end "condemns the Scottish Government’s failure to invest in Modern Apprenticeships for 16 to 18-year-olds, and calls on the Scottish Government to give 16 to 18-year-olds the right to Modern Apprenticeship places." Supported by: Trish Godman
S3M-1743.1 Withdrawal of Modern Apprenticeship Funding (lodged on 23 April 2008) Marlyn Glen*
S3M-1743.1 Withdrawal of Modern Apprenticeship Funding (lodged on 23 April 2008) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-1743.1 Withdrawal of Modern Apprenticeship Funding (lodged on 23 April 2008) Tom McCabe*
